content.description: "Inasmuch as the regime, because of its rigidity, will find it increasingly more difficult to raise industrial output, it is obvious that the standard of living in many sectors of our society may be threatened."
content.question: The statement above was most likely written by a contemporary observer of

choices.label: France after the death of Robespierre
Nazi Germany after the purge of the SA (stormtroopers)
Western Europe during the 1968 student revolts
the Soviet Union at the time of Brezhnev
Great Britain at the time of Margaret Thatcher

content.answer: the Soviet Union at the time of Brezhnev

skill.text: Skill 1.A: Identify a historical concept, development, or process.
